import { Component, Input } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-slides', templateUrl: './slides.component.html', styleUrls: ['./slides.component.css'] }) export class SlidesComponent { @Input() photosSources: string[] = []; currentIndex: number = 0; nextPhoto() { if (this.currentIndex !== this.photosSources.length) { this.currentIndex += 1; } else { this.currentIndex = 0; } } getImage() { return this.photosSources[this.currentIndex] } }
